Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Yellow Line service has been temporarily suspended due to an obstruction at Dodge.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line service has been temporarily suspended due to an obstruction at Dodge. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include: #97 Skokie buses.

  • As a result of the delay, shuttle buses are available from Dempster-Skokie to Howard to provide connecting service in both directions.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.
